transcripts.transcript_text: Speaker A: You have reached the voicemail box of.

Speaker A: Hello. Hello. Hello. Sorry, I'm missing Yuksin. Yeah, I got you a reference on behalf of University College London. Rachna, this side. You were looking for accommodation, right? Yeah, correct. So just wanted to connect with you regarding that itself. So may I just know that you know, have you like finalized on any of the property or. Looking at some options. Mm. But I'm only there for like three months or so. Does that work? You're looking at which university? Like University College London. Right? Yeah. Is there any specific budget that you're looking at? Not really. The thing is I'm there for exchange, so I'm gonna only need like three months or so. Is that possible? Sure. Give me like one second of yours. Let me just quickly check on that availability. You want something like close to university by any chance or some distance? Works for as long as if there's public transport. It's fine for me, it's fine for you. Right. And you need it from September. Yeah, September. September till January. That. That's what you're looking at to December till December. Okay, sure. Let me just. I can see some options available and it's like starting from the 6th of September till the 2nd of Jan. Okay. It's a classic studio. It will take 40 minutes and the commute options are pretty good. The classic studio means private room, private washroom and a private kitchen. It's a 17 week contract available. Is it possible to make the contract a bit shorter? Because I. I'll be needing it from like around like let's say September 14th until like December, like 20th or something. Actually the dates cannot be customized. But you know, 17 weeks, 12 weeks or 20 weeks, you know, like these. The availability gonna be either the contract gonna end by November. Okay, the 14th of September. There is no option of move in. The. The minimum which I can see is the 6th of September. Okay. And the move out dates are either November, like the 29th of November or what I can see is the 2nd of January. I don't see major move ins or move outs, you know, at the moment of December. If you want I can share you, you can look into them and you can decide that you know, this works for you or not. Okay. Is it possible that you send me a few options right now that you think will work? Yeah, definitely. I just wanted to ask you one quick thing that is it like you're using the Same number on WhatsApp? My WhatsApp is currently not working. Should I email you then? Yeah. Okay, so it's Eva G U O23 at the rate ICLOOK.com right. Perfect. I'll send it over to you right away. You can look into them and you can let me know if you like it. Okay, Perfect. Thank you. Thank you very much. No problem. Bye.
